# Entity.Observable.Components

**Structure**

An observable collection of an entity’s attached components, allowing for reactive updates based on component changes.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Components
```

## Overview

Reading a component from this set establishes observation tracking. See [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Observation] for more details.

- **subscript(_:)**
